header.title: Save your teeth <highlight>pain-free</highlight> with cutting-edge technology
header.description: with 14 years of experience saving smiles. Precise, painless root canal treatments using the most advanced endodontic technology.

header.title: <highlight>Endodontics</highlight> Treatments
header.description: We offer a full range of endodontic services with the latest technology to ensure the best outcome in every treatment.

items.title: Endodontics
items.subtitle: Root Canal Treatment
items.description: We save damaged teeth by removing infected pulp and sealing the root canal. Painless procedure with cutting-edge technology.

items.title: Apexification
items.subtitle: For Developing Teeth
items.description: Specialized treatment for young permanent teeth with incomplete roots, promoting natural apical closure.

items.title: Dental Revascularization
items.subtitle: Biological Regeneration
items.description: Regenerative technique that revitalizes necrotic teeth in young patients, restoring pulpal function.

items.title: Internal Bleaching
items.subtitle: Darkened Teeth
items.description: Specialized aesthetic treatment to lighten teeth that have darkened after root canal therapy.

items.title: Retreatment
items.subtitle: Second Chance
items.description: When a previous treatment was unsuccessful, we perform endodontic retreatment to definitively save the tooth.

items.title: Digital Radiography
items.subtitle: Accurate Diagnosis
items.description: Advanced imaging technology for precise diagnoses with less radiation and immediate results.

cta-final.title: Not sure which treatment you need?
cta-final.description: Schedule a consultation and we'll help you find the best solution

header.title: About <highlight>Us</highlight>
header.description: A team dedicated to preserving your natural smile with experience, technology, and human warmth

main.lead: A Team Committed to Your Dental Health
paragraphs: Under the leadership of <highlight>Dr. Enrique Alejandro ChagollÃ¡n Benavides</highlight>, a certified endodontics specialist with over 14 years of experience, our team is dedicated to providing the highest quality treatments.

Every member of our team is highly trained and shares our vision: to make each visit a positive experience where the patient feels comfortable, informed, and confident they are receiving the best possible care.

We combine years of experience with cutting-edge technology, including dental microscopy, digital radiography, and minimally invasive techniques to ensure exceptional results and virtually painless procedures.

values.title: Empathy
values.description: We understand dental anxiety and work to create an environment of trust and calm.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We commit to the highest standards of quality in every procedure.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We use the latest technology to deliver the best results.

values.title: Trust
values.description: We build lasting relationships based on transparency and professionalism.
